termination of this Agreement or discontinuation of the Services, all CRISIL provided

ip.text:
All intellectual property, if any, which pertains to the Services rendered by the Consultant
hereunder, including, without limitation, any know- how, inventions, data, sketches, drawings,
plans, blueprints, recommendations, concepts, designs, research, information, data, materials and
all other matter which the Consultant generates in the course of, or as a result of, Services
performed under this Agreement, whether of a technical, operational, or economic nature, and
any improvements or inventions based thereon and any patent and/or copyright applications
directed thereto and any patents and/or copyrights issuing there from which are conceived or
developed by the Consultant, solely or jointly with CRISIL Foundation(“Intellectual
Property”), shall be the sole property of CRISIL Foundation. The Consultant agrees to execute
any documents or take any other actions as may reasonably be necessary, or as CRISIL
Foundation may reasonably request, at CRISIL Foundation expense, to perfect CRISIL
Foundation perpetual ownership of Intellectual Property.
